alert.note: Alert for Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 9:46AM CDT until June 06 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Illinois... La Moine River at Ripley. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...La Moine River at Ripley. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, FLOOD STAGE. Farmland flooding and rural damages begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Sunday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 9.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri La Moine River Ripley 22.0 22.2 17.3 13.2 11.7 10.9 10.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
